datoCmsKey.name: Jace 'n Ziev

headshot.title: Jacen "Jace" Ziev, headshot via Editor, 7:18:48 PM 9/11/2020

datoCmsKey.bio: Jace is a Brooklyn-based, nonbinary, Theatre Creator and Performer. They tell stories of Dissent and Justice through a Queer lens, aiming to subvert old tropes while establishing new ones. They love rollercoasters, collect twisty puzzles, and believe graphic novels are an underrated medium.
